content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper ore mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) and furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0)
- Inserter at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) that puts into furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0)
- Inserter at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0) that puts into furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0)
- Beltgroup connecting the furnaces to the inserters

### Additional Furnace at position(x=65.0, y=-52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=65.0, y=-52.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into full furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before inserting items. Check the status of the furnace to avoid unnecessary insertions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.
